meta_description: "Upgrade your bathroom with our 48in. vanity set featuring a 5.5in. basin depth and 1.18in. thick vanity top. Includes sink, cabinet, and hardware. Made of solid wood with soft close hinges and slides. Free standing or undermount installation. 1 basin, 2 doors, and 4 drawers for ample storage. Marble vanity top and vitreous china sink. 5 year commercial warranty and 25 year limited manufacturer warranty. Assembly required. Transitional design with rear drain placement. Backsplash and vanity legs included. No faucet or installation hardware included."
meta_title: "Morris 48" Single Vanity Set with Wood Cabinet, Carrara Marble Top, and Rectangular Undermount Sink - Single Faucet Hole"
details:
Ideal for a shared bathroom, the 48" Morris Console Vanity has interior cabinet space, four drawer compartments, and a lower shelf to house your belongings. All entry points are fitted with soft-close hardware to deliver smooth and quiet functionality. The cabinet features a textured finish treatment to add a tactile element to the design.

Signature Hardware 448538 Included Components:

  • Wood vanity cabinet with 2 doors and 4 drawers
  • Carrara marble vanity top with single undermount rectangular vitreous china sink
  • Mirror is not included and must be purchased separately
  • Faucet is not included and must be purchased separately
  • Covered under Signature Hardware's 25 year limited warranty

Cabinet Features:

  • Constructed from wood
  • Free standing installation - vanity is seated on the floor with wall anchors
  • 2 door design provides easy access to storage space
  • Four full extension drawers with soft-close slides allows for organized storage
  • Soft close drawer slides operate on smooth ball-bearings and prevent drawers from slamming shut
  • Vanity cabinet includes matching decorative hardware

Vanity Top Features:

  • Constructed of carrara marble
  • Vanity top includes single undermount basin sink constructed of vitreous china
  • Single pre-drilled faucet hole
  • Polished Carrara Marble is sourced from Italy
  • Each top is carved from a single piece of stone and will feature natural variations
  • Vitreous china sink has an overflow with optional chrome cover

Cabinet Specifications:

  • Cabinet Width: 48" (from left to right)
  • Cabinet Height: 34-1/4" (from top to bottom)
  • Cabinet Depth: 21" (from front to back)
  • Number of Doors: 2
  • Number of Drawers: 4
  • Number of Shelves: 1

Vanity Top Specifications:

  • Vanity Top Width: 49" (left edge to right edge)
  • Vanity Top Depth: 22" (front edge to back edge)
  • Backsplash Height: 4"
  • Number of Basins: 1
  • Sink Measurements: 20-1/4" L X 14-3/4" W X 7-5/8" H
  • Sink Basin Measurements: 18-1/8" L X 12-3/4" W X 5-1/2" H
  • Number of Faucet Holes: 1
